next_steps.note: "Research and document 3-5 common network scanning tools (e.g., Nmap, Masscan, Angry IP Scanner), outlining their strengths and weaknesses.",
"Define the scope of network scanning: Determine what types of networks/devices will be targeted (e.g., local network, specific IP ranges, web servers). Document these parameters.",
"Create a basic Python script using a library like `scapy` to perform a simple ping sweep of a defined IP range.",
"Identify and document potential legal and ethical considerations related to network scanning, including necessary permissions and responsible disclosure.",
"Set up a test environment (virtual machine or isolated network) to safely experiment with network scanning techniques and avoid impacting production systems."
